name: Zark Island
description:
Welcome to Zark Island. Current residents are very unwelcoming so you may want to "Change Their Mind".

Kill 200 Zombies as fast as you can. Fastest times get on the Leaderboard.

Or you can just roam the island killing zombies along the way. There is Zark City, a suburb, mountain and forest areas , plus a hidden place for you to find and reclaim.

This is an Early Access FPS Zombie Hell Shooter. Normal mode is a time based zombie shooter where the fastest player times get on the Public Leaderboard (Leaderboard fully functioning and implemented) Each run should last around 15 to 30 minutes. Horde mode is where continuous waves of zombies spawn and your objective is to alive as long as possible(No leaderboard implemented yet). That is the main game loop right now but I am working to add survival aspects for those that want to roam the Island. 

Controls

Keyboard:

W A S D - keys for movement / (Hold SHIFT to run) 

1 - Pistol

2 - Assault Rifle

6 - Flashlight

R - Reload

T - Inspect Weapon

U - Holster Weapon

P - Pause the Game

M - Go Back to Main Menu

Mouse:

 Left Button - Fire Weapon    

Right Button - Aim

Move your mouse to direct your view.

Player Notes: 

There are crates(Ammo and Med) throughout the island, just touch the crates and stats will be replenished. Note that If you use a crate, it will be unavailable for 5 minutes so wait until you absolutely need it.

There are three main areas in the island. Zark City, the adjacent suburban area and the forest area in the center of the island.

If you are roaming the Zark Island, there is a hidden area that you may stumble upon. Be careful,  there could be a couple zombies claiming that location.
